segments.text: I see the water just pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredible how the woman hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so oblivious to the water all around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger and bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will notice and say something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But they seem too focused on their cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a bit maddening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and warn them about the water.
segments.speaker: PAR
